Title: Relates to the authority of certain existing assisted living programs to expand capacity by nine or fewer beds under an expedited process
Summary: Authorizes certain existing assisted living programs to expand capacity by nine or fewer beds under an expedited process.
LawCode: Amd ยง461-l, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to authority for existing assisted living programs to expand capacity by nine or fewer beds under an expedited process
